title: App on IPad needs massive improvement
text: Enjoy the app on my phone but often when it needs charging I resort to the IPad. This is terrible and that's being kind, takes an age to load and sometimes doesn't at all. Would recommend a fix for this ASAP as most other sites have done there work to improve their app and 10Bet don't want to be left behind.

text: Revamp the app and I can no longer access my account. Contacted customer support who are useless and couldn‚Äôt give me any decent answers for the cause of the problem. title: Worst betting site ever
text: I joined 10 bet deposited ¬£50 and won ¬£200 I then see the next day the money has gone from my account. When i contacted the customer service they said it was a problem on their end and that it would be resolved and back in my account within a week. 4 weeks passed as i battled back and forth but they never gave me a penny back. And i never received the money i deposited. Avoid this site please !!!!!!

title: Worst betting app I‚Äôve used
text:
This is my first ever review; the quality of this app has compelled me to. The app initially takes a very long time to load, and then takes just as long to navigate once you‚Äôre in. It often signs you out not long after logging you in, and is just generally terrible. 

They offer a lot more markets than most, but the quality of the app forces you to not take advantage of them. Do not recommend.

title: Best looking sports book around!
text: The old UI wasn‚Äôt great. But the new look absolutely is! Check it out and you‚Äôll see what I mean. Clean, elegant, intuitive and much faster than it was before. I really like it.

title: Terrible app and procedures
text:
Really slow vs other sites. Matches are slow to be uploaded and updated as an inplay option.

Plus good luck attempting to get any winnings back. They are happy to take money from your bank with zero proof of ID but withdrawing it back to your card requires uploading of multiple documents. Just keep coming back via email saying incorrect docs. Jokers. I‚Äôd go elsewhere folks.

title: Excellent
text: One of the best apps out there plus you receive your winnings especially if you deposit with PayPal within 20 minutes.

title: Stepped up!
text: I started betting there ages ago and took a break from them. They have come a long way and this app looks and feels amazing. Face ID log in, PayPal support, very responsive site and app!

title: Great app for sports betting
text: Very impressed with the app, easy to use, lots of promotions and free bets appear in your account quickly. Not a casino player but won off free spins which topped up my sports balance

title: Works well
text:

title: Awful app!!
text: Terrible app!  Takes forever to load & just as long when navigating & making your selections.  It's always logging you out, I've just had to log in 5 times in a row!!! title: Worst betting app ever!
text: I think this is officially the worst betting app I have tried, it‚Äôs so slow and laggy and it takes about a minute to load something, update your servers 10Bet and give your customers notifications. If you want to know what a good betting app is then go download skybet or bet355
Helps in my betting, saving time and at the same time winning! Try it!

title: Good markets and options let down by slow/laggy interface
text:
As the title says.

Has a decent amount of games and markets however its severely let down by a slow, laggy, choppy interface. 

Needs cleaning up and the random pop ups are annoying. If you are going to offer punters in-play betting then the interface needs to be able to accommodate fast bets, clicks, scrolling.

Unfortunately I won‚Äôt be re-depositing till this is fixed.

title: Money went missing from account
text: Worst betting app I've used apart from worst set up  I've seen of putting bets on and the lag on it is very bad and then to find out I was winning and all of a sudden money went missing out of my sports account while playing on casino part and I enquired about this and there was no help from customer service made a lot of gibberish and lots of lies from them about things supposed to be like this and just nonsense wish I could show u the customer service response perhaps I will put that on twitter to put people off from signing up but if I was u stay away from this site and don't get me started on the bonuses!!!!!!!!

title: Needs major work
text:
Signed up for this for the bonus, which if you think about it is pretty ridiculous that you have to turn over so much to get it. If you do manage to win some it would take forever to turn over that much to actually see your bonus! Wrong in my opinion.

Now on to the app, very slick looking, but that's were it ends! Navigation is poor, no easy way to find games/matches for that day, weird logging in and out sometimes it logs you back in sometimes you go back after 2 mins and you have to log back in again. Can be slow at times and error messages constantly. Also a better my bets page is needed. And faster settling of bets. Needs more markets for sports as well such as lower league clubs and darts games.

Has potential to be amazing but needs a lot of work!

1 star at the moment for me.

title: Very bad and very slow
text: 2017- Bad navigation + very slow, crashes or server errors. Anyone saying this is a good app isn't being honest. Wait 60 secs to bet on the same choice again, this means if you have a multiple and just want to change it even slightly for a new bet you have to wait 60 seconds. 2018 - Tried again a year later and even worse, agree with everyone who says it‚Äôs difficult to withdraw money. Can only recommend you avoid it, so many apps doing the same thing far better.

title: Never receive deposit bonus
text: You will never receive your deposit bonus unless you send them a copy of your driving license, you holding your driving licence, your passport, you holding your passport, a utility bill, you holding your utility bill, you standing in front of your house, you doing a handstand in front of your house, you doing a handstand in front of your house holding all of the above documents.... In your toes.... With one hand in your pocket!
